long_description: Protect your feet from shoe friction and pressure with this soft, smooth cotton flannel padding. Cushions corns and calluses while protecting tender spots and preventing blisters. Includes: 3 self-adhesive trim-to-fit strips. To use: bathe and dry feet, cut adhesive strip to fit afflicted area, remove backing and apply (do not use directly on blisters or broken skin).
short_description: Protect your feet from shoe friction and pressure with this soft, smooth cotton flannel padding.
